    • ArmyFactory

      public ArmyFactory(int size, Set<String> units)
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the army.
      units - A set of String representing unit types.

    • ArmyFactory

      public ArmyFactory(int size, Set<String> units, double splitBias)
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the army.
      units - A set of String representing unit types.
      splitBias - A double in the range of [0,1] representing how much the army will be split into different troops.

    • ArmyFactory

      public ArmyFactory(int size, Set<String> units, double splitBias, Long seed)
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the army.
      units - A set of String representing unit types.
      splitBias - A double in the range of [0,1] representing how much the army will be split into different troops.
      seed - The random number generator seed.

    • getTroopsSizes

      private int[] getTroopsSizes(int troopAmount)
      Troops sizes This is the main distribution algorithm and so where you'd like to update the RNG quality if needed
      Parameters:
      troopAmount - The amount of troops in the army.
      Returns:
      An array containing the amount of units in each troops.
